steps.name: Perform Login request with the userCredentials
Setting up the BaseURi, Content Type as Application/JSON and attaching the Sensitive Data Filter
Getting the Property Value from the config file
Expecting the response to have Content Type as Application/JSON, Statuc 200 and Response time is less than 2000 ms

labels.name: story
labels.value: Valid User should be able to login into the system
